note: Blue tick taking refuge from Twitter. Singer-songwriter and producer waiting for pop stardom: debut solo pop album BETTER drops in 2024 under artist name Ariane X. Words: Guardian, Observer, Sunday Times, Esquire, New Statesman, Independent, Independent on Sunday, NME.  Books: The How of Happy (2022), How to Live to 100 (2020), Talk Yourself Better (2018), all Hachette; The Atheist’s Guide to Christmas (2009), HarperCollins. Mixed race Asian Londoner. British/American. She/Her.
